titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3340) to place the Financial Stability Oversight Council and the Office of Financial Research under the regular appropriations process, to provide for certain quarterly reporting and public notice and comment requirements for the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3791) to raise the consolidated assets threshold under the small bank holding company policy statement, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3340) to place the Financial Stability Oversight Council and the Office of Financial Research under the regular appropriations process, to provide for certain quarterly reporting and public notice and comment requirements for the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3791) to raise the consolidated assets threshold under the small bank holding company policy statement, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-489, by Mr. Stivers.
The resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 3340 and H.R. 3791.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 671.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 671, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 182 (Roll no. 143).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 182 (Roll no. 144).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3340) to place the Financial Stability Oversight Council and the Office of Financial Research under the regular appropriations process, to provide for certain quarterly reporting and public notice and comment requirements for the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3791) to raise the consolidated assets threshold under the small bank holding company policy statement.
